import axios from "axios" import { useState } from "react" import Content from "./Content" const Navbar = () => { const [searchMovie, setSearchMovie] = useState([]) const handleSearch=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); axios.get(`https://api.themoviedb.org/3/search/movie?api_key=3e9bf10c4b9da58346377bed9363e958&query=${e.target.value}`) .then(movie => movie.data) .then(res=> setSearchMovie(res.results)) } return ( <>

UwU Movies

) } export default Navbar
